paragraphs.content: The Principal hereby engages the Contractor to act as statutory director of the Principal (the **"Assignment"**), which the Contractor accepts. In particular, the Contractor undertakes to manage the day-to-day operations of the Principal (the **"Management Services"**).

The Contractor shall assign a manager (the **"Manager"**) with adequate knowledge and experience to perform the Management Services. The Manager shall perform these services entirely at the expense and risk, and under the responsibility, of the Contractor.
In the event of illness or incapacity for work of the Manager, the Contractor shall provide adequate replacement.

The Contractor shall provide all services and perform acts that are necessary or desirable for the Principal in the context of the Management Services and as may reasonably be required of a statutory director under Dutch law, in accordance with the Dutch Civil Code and the articles of association of the Principal. The Contractor shall be responsible for the day-to-day management of the Principal and shall perform its duties properly, carefully and faithfully, and to the best of its ability, in a manner conducive to the interests of the Principal and its stakeholders.

The Contractor has all powers of a statutory director under Dutch law and the articles of association of the Principal, as amended from time to time, and is at all times subject to the instructions and/or limitations set out in this Agreement or otherwise agreed in writing.
The Contractor shall devote sufficient time and attention to the Management Services during the Term of this Agreement.
